transcription_text: Because I will settle the war in Ukraine and I will end the chaos in the Middle East and I will prevent something that nobody else will be able to do. I will prevent World War Three and you are very close to World War Three. Biden and Kamala got us into this war in Ukraine and now they can't get us out. They can't get us out. I watched him. We will win. We will. He's been saying that for three years. Every time Zelensky comes to the United States, he walks away with $100 billion. I think he's the greatest salesman on earth. But we're stuck in that war unless I'm president. I'll get it done. I'll get it negotiated. I'll get out. We've got to get out.
